verses.roman:
bāra bāra prabhu yadi tāre ājñā dila
tabe sei śloka rūpa-gosāñi kahila

synonyms: bāra bāra—again and again; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; yadi—when; tāre—him; ājñā dila—ordered; tabe—at that time; sei śloka—that particular verse; rūpa-gosāñi—of the name Rūpa Gosvāmī; kahila—recited.
translation: When the Lord persisted in asking this again and again, Rūpa Gosvāmī recited that verse [as follows].
